thread.section_title: Hotel des Arts - Montmartre - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hote, lovely people
thread.title_full: Nice hote, lovely people - Review of Hotel des Arts - Montmartre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: BeattieLondon
title: Nice hote, lovely people
text:
First rate Parisian hotel in a great location. The staff are all helpful and charming. A great place to stay.
I travel to Paris several times a year and this has now become my hotel of choice. Additionally being right in the centre of Montmartre, one is surrounded by great places to eat and drink.
